constraints.name: path_inclusion_or_adjacency
constraints.description: 操作0中，所有在路径P(u, v)上或与路径P(u, v)上的结点相邻的结点w的绚丽度l_w将被赋值为k。
constraints.formal: ∀ w ∈ P(u, v) ∪ {x | ∃ y ∈ P(u, v), (x, y) ∈ E}, l_w = k

constraints.name: sequence_construction
constraints.description: 操作1中，从u到v的路径上，每个结点w及其不在路径P(u, v)上的邻接点x的绚丽度l_w和l_x按顺序加入序列S。
constraints.formal: S = [l_w, l_x1, l_x2, ...] where w ∈ P(u, v) and x1, x2, ... are neighbors of w not in P(u, v)

constraints.name: max_subarray_sum
constraints.description: 对于每次操作1，需要求出序列S的最大可空子段和。
constraints.formal: max(∑ S[i:j]) for all 0 ≤ i ≤ j ≤ |S|, including the case where i = j (empty subarray)
